TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RegistryAuditRule extends System.Security.AccessControl.AuditRule
Public NotInheritable Class RegistryAuditRule Inherits AuditRule

summary.span: Represents a set of access rights to be audited for a user or group.

span.span: Represents a set of access rights to be audited for a user or group.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是一套.NET Framework 提供了用于管理 Windows 注册表项的访问控制安全性的类之一。The class is one of a set of classes that the .NET Framework provides for managing Windows access control security on registry keys. 有关这些类和二者关系的基础 Windows 访问控制结构的概述，请参阅。For an overview of these classes and their relationship to the underlying Windows access control structures, see . > [!NOTE] > Windows 访问控制安全性仅可以应用于注册表项中。Windows access control security can only be applied to registry keys. 它不能应用于单个键/值对存储在注册表项。It cannot be applied to individual key/value pairs stored in a key. 若要获取当前应用于注册表项的审核规则的列表，请使用方法以获取对象，，然后使用其方法来获取的集合对象。To get a list of the audit rules currently applied to a registry key, use the method to get a object, and then use its method to obtain a collection of objects. 对象不映射一对一与基础的自由访问控制列表 (DACL) 中的访问控制项。 objects do not map one-to-one with access control entries in the underlying discretionary access control list (DACL). 当您获取组的所有审核规则的注册表项，该集合包含的最小当前表示所有访问控制项所需要的规则数。When you get the set of all audit rules for a registry key, the set contains the minimum number of rules currently required to express all the access control entries. > [!NOTE] > 基础的访问控制项更改，因为将应用并删除规则。The underlying access control entries change as you apply and remove rules. 如果可能，合并规则中的信息来维护最少数量的访问控制项。The information in rules is merged if possible, to maintain the smallest number of access control entries. 因此，当读取的规则的当前列表，它可能不完全一样已添加的所有规则的列表。Thus, when you read the current list of rules, it might not look exactly like the list of all the rules you have added. 使用对象来指定审核的用户或组的访问权限。Use objects to specify access rights to be audited for a user or group. 若要将规则应用于注册表项，使用方法以获取对象。To apply a rule to a registry key, use the method to get the object. 修改对象通过使用其方法来添加规则，然后使用方法重新附加安全对象。Modify the object by using its methods to add the rule, and then use the method to reattach the security object. > [!IMPORTANT] > 对所做的更改对象并不会影响注册表项的访问级别，直到你调用方法以将修改过的安全对象分配给注册表项。Changes you make to a object do not affect the access levels of the registry key until you call the method to assign the altered security object to the registry key. 对象是不可变。 objects are immutable. 使用的方法修改注册表项安全性类来添加或删除规则; 执行此操作时，修改的基础的访问控制项。Security for a registry key is modified by using the methods of the class to add or remove rules; as you do this, the underlying access control entries are modified.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public RegistryAuditRule (System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference identity, System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryRights registryRights, System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags inheritanceFlags, System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags propagationFlags, System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags flags);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference identity, valuetype System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryRights registryRights, valuetype System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags inheritanceFlags, valuetype System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags propagationFlags, valuetype System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags flags) cil managed

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the user or group to audit, the rights to audit, whether to take inheritance into account, and whether to audit success, failure, or both.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the user or group to audit, the rights to audit, whether to take inheritance into account, and whether to audit success, failure, or both.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有注册表项都是容器，因此对注册表项有意义的唯一继承标志是标志。All registry keys are containers, so the only inheritance flag that is meaningful for registry keys is the flag. 如果未指定此标志，则忽略传播标志，并仅即时项会受到影响。If this flag is not specified, the propagation flags are ignored, and only the immediate key is affected. 如果存在标志，则规则会传播下表中所示。If the flag is present, the rule is propagated as shown in the following table. 表假定没有子项 S 具有子项 CS 和孙级子项 GS。The table assumes there is a subkey S with child subkey CS and grandchild subkey GS. 也就是说，孙级子项的路径是 S\CS\GS。That is, the path for the grandchild subkey is S\CS\GS. |传播标志Propagation flags|SS|CSCS|GSGS| |-----------------------|-------|--------|--------| ||XX|XX|XX| ||XX|XX|| |||XX|XX| |, , ||XX|| 三级子项的模式控制三级子项中包含的所有子项。The pattern for the grandchild subkey governs all subkeys contained by the grandchild subkey. 例如，如果标志已指定给`inheritanceFlags`和的指定传播标志`propagationFlags`，此规则不适用于直接子项，但未应用于其所有直接子子项及其所有子项它们包含。For example, if the flag is specified for `inheritanceFlags` and the propagation flag is specified for `propagationFlags`, this rule does not apply to the immediate subkey, but does apply to all its immediate child subkeys and to all subkeys they contain. > [!NOTE] > 虽然可以指定标志`inheritanceFlags`，在此过程中没有点。Although you can specify the flag for `inheritanceFlags`, there is no point in doing so. 对于访问控制，子项中的名称/值对不是单独的对象。For the purposes of access control, the name/value pairs in a subkey are not separate objects. 名称/值对的访问权限由该子项的权限控制。The access rights to name/value pairs are controlled by the rights of the subkey. 此外，由于所有子项都是容器 （即，它们可以包含其他子项），它们不受标志。Furthermore, since all subkeys are containers (that is, they can contain other subkeys), they are not affected by the flag. 最后，指定标志不必要地增加复杂性进行维护的规则，因为它干扰兼容的规则的正常组合。Finally, specifying the flag needlessly complicates the maintenance of rules, because it interferes with the normal combination of compatible rules.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有注册表项都是容器，因此对注册表项有意义的唯一继承标志是标志。All registry keys are containers, so the only inheritance flag that is meaningful for registry keys is the flag. 如果未指定此标志，则忽略传播标志，并仅即时项会受到影响。If this flag is not specified, the propagation flags are ignored, and only the immediate key is affected. 如果存在标志，则规则会传播下表中所示。If the flag is present, the rule is propagated as shown in the following table. 表假定没有子项 S 具有子项 CS 和孙级子项 GS。The table assumes there is a subkey S with child subkey CS and grandchild subkey GS. 也就是说，孙级子项的路径是 S\CS\GS。That is, the path for the grandchild subkey is S\CS\GS. |传播标志Propagation flags|SS|CSCS|GSGS| |-----------------------|-------|--------|--------| ||XX|XX|XX| ||XX|XX|| |||XX|XX| |, , ||XX|| 三级子项的模式控制三级子项中包含的所有子项。The pattern for the grandchild subkey governs all subkeys contained by the grandchild subkey. 例如，如果标志已指定给`inheritanceFlags`和的指定传播标志`propagationFlags`，此规则不适用于直接子项，但未应用于其所有直接子子项及其所有子项它们包含。For example, if the flag is specified for `inheritanceFlags` and the propagation flag is specified for `propagationFlags`, this rule does not apply to the immediate subkey, but does apply to all its immediate child subkeys and to all subkeys they contain. > [!NOTE] > 虽然可以指定标志`inheritanceFlags`，在此过程中没有点。Although you can specify the flag for `inheritanceFlags`, there is no point in doing so. 对于访问控制，子项中的名称/值对不是单独的对象。For the purposes of access control, the name/value pairs in a subkey are not separate objects. 名称/值对的访问权限由该子项的权限控制。The access rights to name/value pairs are controlled by the rights of the subkey. 此外，由于所有子项都是容器 （即，它们可以包含其他子项），它们不受标志。Furthermore, since all subkeys are containers (that is, they can contain other subkeys), they are not affected by the flag. 最后，指定标志不必要地增加复杂性进行维护的规则，因为它干扰兼容的规则的正常组合。Finally, specifying the flag needlessly complicates the maintenance of rules, because it interferes with the normal combination of compatible rules. 此构造函数等效于创建对象，通过传递`identity`到构造函数，并传递新创建对象传递给构造函数。This constructor is equivalent to creating an object, by passing `identity` to the constructor, and passing the newly created object to the constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RegistryRights As RegistryRights

summary.span: Gets the access rights affected by the audit rule.

span.span: Gets the access rights affected by the audit rule.

value.span: 按位组合值，该值指示审核规则影响的权限。

span.span: A bitwise combination of values that indicates the rights affected by the audit rule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象是不可变。 objects are immutable. 你可以创建新的审核规则，以表示不同的用户、 不同的权限或不同的组合标志，但你无法修改现有的审核规则。You can create a new audit rule representing a different user, different rights, or a different combination of flags, but you cannot modify an existing audit rule.
